QuasarDB | Solutions Architect | Full-Time, Remote | https://www.quasardb.net

QuasarDB is a company developing next generation database technologies. We believe it makes no sense to wait for the database. Real time is always better!

As a Solutions Architect, your job is to ensure the success of our customers via the proper usage of the QuasarDB technology, evangelize its features, by writing white papers, code samples, demonstrations, and work with the R&D team to make sure the features are linked to actual use cases.

https://www.quasardb.net/careers/
